name: Grave Gardener
description:
Protect the city graveyard from overzealous city planners and construction workers!

Harvest the bones of the dead to plant deadly plants!

Controls:
WASD / Arrow Keys to move.

Melee Attack: Space or Right Ctrl

Throw Bone: Left Shift or Right Shift

Select Grave or Plant: Return/Enter or E

Leave Build Menu or Pause: Escape or Q

Credits:

Wyntre Amaranth: Environmental Art and Animation

Jackie Chen: Enemy Art and Animation

Hunter Mansanas: UI and Particle Effects

Tyler Baldwin: Production, Sound and UI

Kevin Bryan: Design and Programming

Jacob Nowack: Player and Plant art and animation

Brandon Garcia Carrillo: Programming
